title: Welcome to Face Generator
subtitle: This is a web application that allows you to generate faces using a GAN model. More specifically, it uses a StyleGAN2 model trained on the ... dataset.

random_faces.description: Generate an amount of random faces.

search_faces.description: Search for faces using an id. Also displays all generated images.

transition_faces.description: Generate an amount of faces (transitions) between two faces.

face_from_image.description: Generate a face from an image.

features_modification.description: Modify the features of a generated face.

interchange_features.description: Interchange the features of two faces.

faces_series.description: View all the saved faces series.
